lender.name: Adrienne
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed with a wonderful family, great job, and all the comforts of life. I want to share some of my good fortune with those in need and who are willing to work to improve their lives.

lender.name: Mary Ann in Cambodia
lender.loan_because: The generosity of others helped me reach this point in my life where I can be generous with others.
lender.occupational_info: For nearly 40 years, I worked in corporate American. I now volunteer most of my time helping others.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: Daniel has a 2-year-old food shop in Africa on Abacha Road Port Harcourt nigeria, where he sells food to his customers, who are mostly foreigners and the community people. he is 27 years old with 2 children, as he caters to grandchildren and cousins as well. he needs a loan to enable him to buy more goods, although he makes some of them himself, as well as help to look after his home. he is a member of Committed men in Development, a lending group that has helped in instilling the discipline of saving and teamwork among its members.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: Knowing that a small effort on my part makes a big difference to someone else is very rewarding.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying to be a teacher.

lender.name: Felipe
lender.loan_because: I know what it feels like when you have good intentions and just need a little help to get your business started. By helping others, you can motivate them to help more people. "Pay it Forward," it feels good to help responsible people and their community become more productive.
lender.occupational_info: I am building a job centric social networking web service with a team of people that are passionate about helping others.

lender.name: HEIDI
lender.loan_because: Looking to help someone out where I can!

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: I was a Peace Corps volunteer years and years ago and saw how much a little bit of money could change the lives of hardworking people.
lender.occupational_info: Middle school Science teacher

lender.name: Rohun
lender.loan_because: I think micro financing is a great way to empower people and help eliminate poverty. And I want to help in anyway possible

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: its time to give some back ...
lender.occupational_info: I build systems to run Telecom based Services.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I have traveled to some poor countries and a small amount of money can make a big difference for the people of these countries. It is amazing what they can do with so litlte.
lender.occupational_info: I help people in the community on a daily basis.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because:
I could buy more meaningless stuff but I don't need it and these people do.
I am a PROUD PROGRESSIVE LIBERAL.
lender.occupational_info:
I pick the photos that are printed in a sports magazine.
And I love it.

lender.name: CMA
lender.loan_because: I like to help others to become successful in their lives

lender.name: maxie
lender.loan_because: there but for the grace of god goes I
lender.occupational_info: In recent readings i stumbled across this quote that sums it up pretty good "...at times we may pretend we dont hear our calling to serve, or we may rationalize that we are too busy. we may even try to convince ourselves that we are not capable because someone else is more qualified. however, god does not call the qualified; god qualifies those called."

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because:
It makes me feel good. :-)
and I like to think that if our positions were reversed, the people that I loan to would loan to me.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: It's my way of investing in the future not only with my limited funding but with an infusion of hope and inclusion.
lender.occupational_info: I weigh refuse that is going into a public landfill...the customer who brings in the garbage is charged a tonnage rate/fee for what is disposed of.

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: I'm a former Peace Corps Volunteer who served in Burkina Faso in West Africa. I've seen firsthand what life is like in developing countries. I want to help give others opportunity the way I've been given it by accident of birth.
lender.occupational_info: I am in graduate school studying creative writing.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I can! Just trying to do my part.
lender.occupational_info: As a genetic counselor I see patients who have, or are at risk to develop, genetic diseases. I also work for a new company that is bringing genetic testing to the consumer market.

lender.name: Sergey, Teresa & Paola
lender.loan_because: We want to help people realize their potential

lender.name: SIMON
lender.loan_because: Am glad a little help from me can help those in need. And wishing everyone good health and happiness forever.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have enough and lots of support. I would like to help others to have the same.
lender.occupational_info: I help students figure out how to pay for college.

lender.name: Stefan
lender.loan_because: There are many people with entrepreneurial spirit who can make a difference. Giving money anonymously to organizations is boring.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: retired

lender.name: Kathy
lender.occupational_info: I provide home care to people so they can heal and age in their own home and not in a facility.

lender.name: Katya
lender.loan_because: -I want to give people a chance, as I have been given chances by others -Its nice to help those, who want to help themselves -I want to make a difference, and think that this is such a good idea
lender.occupational_info: I am a small business owner and design and manufacture clothing and have a retail store to promote emerging designers

lender.name: Lily
lender.loan_because: It's a way I can help to reduce the inequalities in our world.
lender.occupational_info: As a therapist I help people get in touch with the wisdom and guidance within themselves. As a facilitator I try to make space to hold and address the tensions that are present between between and between different groups of people.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: We can do big things together. And we have so much to give, it just takes a little effort and a little heart.
lender.occupational_info: I work with nonprofits to help them better manage their constituent and donor base through a software application called DonorPro.

lender.name: Inge
lender.loan_because: We live in a rich country and have finally a good personal economy. I believe in the Law of the Universe, that what you give will come back to you some day, in some form. In my work I see that this is true. We adopted a boy from Colombia many years ago, and he now has children of his own. We feel that it's time to give something back ourselves. Our primary target will be South America because we feel something special for that part of the world and for its warm, generous and hospitable people.
lender.occupational_info: I help and support people to make a good living, and with health prevention.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I like to help those who are willing to help themselves. Many small contributions from around the world can make a big difference in ones life and the community around them.

lender.name: terry
lender.loan_because: someone very special helped me to finish my education by paying for it. I loan in her honor, and her mother's honor, becuase she helped me.
lender.occupational_info: I organize my boss's life for him.

lender.name: Raymond
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I have my students pick the people that need loans. Then we see what happens. For Christmas this year I gave my my niece and nephew $100 dollars each to donate. Pass on the urge to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 120 7th graders life science. Most students are 12-13 years old. I love to teach.

lender.name: Ryann
lender.loan_because: it helps people help themself
lender.occupational_info: Don't work Im 10 Almost 11

lender.name: Jennifer & Donny
lender.loan_because: ...just a little help can make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an ambulance, I both drive and provide medical care. My partner and I respond to medical emergencies when people are in need of help.

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me this opportunity to partner with another, as they bring their best to family and community.
lender.occupational_info: Helping others receive medical treatment.

lender.name: Christine E
lender.loan_because: I have seen how a little help at the right time can change lives; I know I have been very fortunate in my life and want others to feel fortunate in theirs.
lender.occupational_info: My company helps medical researchers learn the causes of diseases, primarily cancers. I have 8 employees, most of them women, and have learned that keeping them happy and learning is probably the best and most important thing to keep my business running smoothly.

lender.name: Jefferson Juniors
lender.loan_because: The Junior Woman's Club of Jefferson Township loan because we care.
lender.occupational_info: Faith, Hope, Charity

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: I like to help people getting started.

lender.name: Sonya Soni
lender.occupation: USC Keck School of Medicine student
lender.loan_because: I truly believe that each individual can change the world, and each of our actions, even the smallest gesture, has the potential to serve humanity in the most profound ways. I was always passionate about making a difference in the world through global health and medicine, but Kiva has opened my eyes in how the world of service and eradicating poverty can be approached from a multidisciplinary effort, from health care to business to sustainable development, in which individuals from all fields can come together to serve. I love how Kiva promotes the idea of a unified global family, in which as human beings, we are all dependent on each other. Kiva focuses on enriching the quality of people's lives in the developing world by not solely focusing on basic survival, but on their sense of self-efficacy, in which other individuals half way across the world genuinely believe in their potential to succeed and live their best life possible.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: It helps
lender.occupational_info: I work in a factory using a computer to test new electronics.

lender.name: Scarlett Heights E.A.
lender.loan_because: We are a club of business leaders in an entrepreneurial focussed school that recognizes the value of thinking globally and acting locally, or in this case, acting locally to impact globally!
lender.occupational_info: We train to compete in local and international business competitions as well as fundraise for organizations that align with our values and goals.

lender.name: Traute
lender.loan_because: helping to help yourself makes sense

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I can help someone

lender.name: frith
lender.loan_because: if in some small way i can make a difference....

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I desire to always be someone who gives.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a doctor's office, and help keep things running smoothly. Short of diagnosing medical conditions there's nothing I don't do...

lender.name: RememberJon.com
lender.loan_because: Muhammad Yunus convinced me that microloans work. My brother believed in making big changes in the world through many small actions.

lender.name: jos
lender.loan_because: I don't need the money as much as they do
lender.occupational_info: I own a software company

lender.name: Johan
lender.loan_because: It is one of the good ethical choices you can make in your life.

lender.name: Luke
lender.loan_because: lots of people on this site can be more productive with this money than I can
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Guardian newspaper, helping to promote quality journalism

lender.name: Danielle B.
lender.loan_because: I love help people

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: Everyone should take pride in what they do. Small seeds change the world.
lender.occupational_info: Time and space have qualitative and mathematical properities that appeal to my philosophical mind. My work is diagnostic and educational, fluctating from predictive estimates to practical problemsolving.

lender.name: Rene
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with shelter, food and water. I want to give others the opportunity to better themselves. Kiva is the only organisation I know of where 100% of funds donated go to the end user.
lender.occupational_info: I teach individuals and their organisations, (in the public and private sector), how to manage their supply chains more effectively.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people live their dreams and expand their world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an artist and an assistant kindergarten teacher.

lender.name: Adrienne
lender.loan_because: To honor my mother and grandmothers.

lender.name: MPK
lender.occupational_info: helping people to keep their bodies in healthy working order

lender.name: Coupongood.org
lender.loan_because: I want to help change lives by saving you money with thousands of free online coupon codes.
lender.occupational_info:
We spend our time writing software code and finding great online coupons, so we can make loans to some great people in Uganda.
One loan each day -- that's our goal.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I want to do my part to eradicate poverty in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help make the process of borrowing and saving money easy for people.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: I want to share what I have with others
lender.occupational_info: I teach 7-8 years old reading, writing. math, science and social studies. I teach life lessons and get to talk to children all day!

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: It's great to see people all around the world working towards a better life for themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that helps patients with serious diseases have better lives and live longer.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: It enables me to help others, who in turn, as they achieve their goals, can help others to achieve.
lender.occupational_info: I work with businesses to help them do business with government.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I would like to help others across the world earn a living and become successful.
lender.occupational_info: Website Development and Marketing

lender.name: Bala
lender.loan_because: I believe the world is a single family and we all need to help each other
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: My sister invited me, and gave me a birth certificate. Once I've got some more cash money, I plan to start putting more money in.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school, and entertain.

lender.name: Laura and Steven
lender.loan_because: We can
lender.occupational_info: To make a better world with integrity and hard work. We help leverage technology and information services and environmental science and policy. We believe the world is and will change for the better because of the internet, this program is a prime example. Everyone deserves a chance and the information to make all things possible for those willing to extend themselves, work hard, and believe in themselves. "Do on to others as you would be done on to."

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I feel that helping is the right thing to do. Also, it's fun!

lender.name: Sola
lender.loan_because: God created us to be a blessing. I want to see other people succeed, and Kiva gives me that opportunity. Funding for my store has been very challenging, so I can empathize with these entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: After several years as a Senior Finance Administrator, I now own a store and online retail biz selling high quality clothing and accessories from natural, organic and environmentally sustainable fibers.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I had a hand extended to me so I extend mine to another.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to and everyone deserves a chance to live their dream.

lender.name: Becky & Guy
lender.loan_because: I am grateful that I've had a good life. I want to give back to help the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: We provide computer systems support for a large gaming and auto parts company.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I love being part of a solution...
lender.occupational_info: Looking to make a difference, one person at a time

lender.name: Lesley
lender.loan_because: I loan because I able and since I am able then I should.

lender.name: Minyan Dorshei Derekh
lender.loan_because: Since we never get to the bottom dollars of our modest treasury, we have decided to loan it through KIVA, so it's aligned with our faith tradition of helping the other.
lender.occupational_info: Reconstructionist/Havurah style Jewish community in Mt. Airy, Philadelphia.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with a job that allows me to help other people and pays well enough that I can give to those in need. I love people and I believe we are all connected in spirit. I feel honored to be able to help another human being.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse and my job is to help people make plans for going home from the hospital. I take care of all the details, such as equipment needed, home health, or perhaps needing to go to a Covalescent Home. I get alot of satisfaction from my job.

lender.name: Darby
lender.loan_because: Because I like to help people and families in need. I also like to see who they are and what they are doing.

lender.name: Nxpire
lender.loan_because: I want to see people improve their business and life
lender.occupational_info: Providing expertise in high tech products and creating new business.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I believe this is what Jesus would do. "It is well with the man who is gracious and lends." (Psalm 112:5)
lender.occupational_info: I teach beginning teachers how to teach young children.

lender.name: ralph
lender.loan_because: I want to give other people a chance to become small business owner and feel the rewards of doing a good job for their customers and for their family
lender.occupational_info: I repair watches in a one person shop that I started 30 years ago

lender.name: Therese
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I make necklaces to sell to friends and raise money for charities.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I love Jesus. And Jesus loves people.

lender.name: Jeremiah & Amanda
lender.loan_because: We can all use a little help now and then!
lender.occupational_info: We own a window and carpet cleaning business.

lender.name: Jonathon
lender.occupational_info: I help protect homes and businesses from loss due to theft or liablilty fraud.

lender.name: Sandeep
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage people to take the initiative to be self sufficient, that includes taking responsibility for their livelihoods. Kiva is a good way to start doing that.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: a friend's generosity helped me return to school. Now I can 'pay it forward.'

lender.name: kylie
lender.loan_because: I wish to give to others and help them fulfill there dreams,large or small.
lender.occupational_info: My job as a chef is to cook for people that love to dine out and experencie foods that they would not usually cook for themselves.

lender.name: Lucky Buttons
lender.loan_because: I like to!
lender.occupational_info: I paint colorful people and animals that I see in my imagination.

lender.name: nisa abas
lender.loan_because: i want to start my internet bussiness.
lender.occupational_info: making craft stuff like bag, diaper stacker, clutch and others

lender.name: Rueben & Marlene
lender.loan_because: We have so much, and others have so little! We want to help others where ever we can. We are blessed to be able to share what we have! This is a wonderful way to be able to assist others around the world, one person at a time! Thanks Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: We are fortunate, we have our own business in construction, and we are very involved in Christ centered ministry. God has blessed us, and we love to share that with others.

lender.name: Maxima MFI
lender.loan_because: Teach people how to fish is best way to let them sustainability. As we are also microfinance operator in Cambodia which a lots of poor people live under poverty line, We know what people need and how people can survive from micro loan. Helping is humanity which god told us.
lender.occupational_info: Please visit http://www.maxima.com.kh

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: sometimes you need to see beyond the limits we impose upon ourselves
lender.occupational_info: I work in a warehouse keeping the place clean and tidy

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: It's good to help someone who is trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Fix washers, dryers, stoves, refrigerators, etc. Also do graphics work on computer- maps, books, etc. Do video on computer- community documentaries, training film, advertisements.

lender.name: Tamera
lender.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place in any way I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional photographer.

lender.name: Nicolette
lender.loan_because: I like to help. And I like to know exactly what's happening and who my money is helping.
lender.occupational_info: I edit books in various stages of pre-publication.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: For me, starting a small business is easy because of family support, and I would like to make someone else's start in business at least a little bit easier.
lender.occupational_info: I draw pictures and sell them to people or to magazines.

lender.name: Ming
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in need.

lender.name: Mahfuz
lender.loan_because: I want to see people smiling.
lender.occupational_info: I don't make software, I make it better...

lender.loan_because: entrepeneurs are, after education, the ones who developes society
lender.occupational_info: take care we develope the right strategy depending on the different market requirements and shareholders interests

lender.loan_because: as a general secretary of a charity FACE, we have promoted a livelihood group federation in Vedaraniyam. I want to support 2 groups to involve in electronic choke making wiork. they are all well been trained. the need only a seed capital tro start the work
lender.occupational_info: electronic choke making activity

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: It is important to show that micro-credits actually work.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work with nonprofit agencies in Pittsburgh, connecting them to students.

lender.name: Penny
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I travel. I teach english in Rwanda when i am able to be there. I used to work long hours on television commercials and music videos in New York City. That is what I do. Imagination liberator is who I am.

lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Dan

lender.loan_because: I want mothers across the globe to have a chance to better their lives, both for themselves and for the future of their children.

lender.loan_because: I am blessed and want to give back

lender.name: Rotary Club of Koreatown in Los Angeles
Shawn
lender.loan_because: I want to help people clear hurdles and to do something substantial in their lives. Nothing is more satisfying than to help people gain financial independence and confidence.
lender.occupational_info: I run an IT consulting firm

lender.name: RAP
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to make a difference! A little amount from my funds can make a huge difference for someone else.

lender.loan_because: I love.

lender.name: Donnie
lender.loan_because: My daughter Mollybeth (age 6) said she wanted to "Help mommas who didn't have money for their babies."
lender.occupational_info: I help people discover their role in the grand story God is telling.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: Helping others in a responsible way makes the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I assist companies in marketing and growing their businesses.

lender.name: Barb
lender.loan_because: My son gave me a gift certificate and it's a great idea.
lender.occupational_info: I teach older adults how to find jobs and use computers to help them get hired.

lender.name: eric
lender.loan_because: Jesus said that I should help the poor, the orphans and the widows.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I enjoy empowering & assisting other people achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I provide management consulting to large corporations to help them simplify and streamline their operations by working proactively on quality and performance issues.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I love as I have been loved by the creator!
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Grand Valley State University. Psychology Major

lender.name: The Knox Family
lender.loan_because: God has been gracious to us. He has brought us back to himself through Jesus Christ. In response, we can't help but love other people. This is just one way of demonstrating God's love to people around the world.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: A chance to use something I have to make a sustainable change. This is one way to help people fulfil potential not just throw money at the 'needy'. Taking an active role and interest in both the person and the work being undertaken is important.
lender.occupational_info: I am a finance manager working for the government. Most of what I do is looking at projects and make sure they are correctly costed, risk accessed, managed etc. It is a busy role but fun.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently unemployed, and I go to school full time.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: He has shown you, O mortal, what is good. And what does the LORD require of you? To act justly and to love mercy and to walk humbly with your God. Holy Bible | Micah 6:8

lender.name: Damien
lender.loan_because: Curiosity killed the cat.

lender.name: Matt & Tashia
lender.occupational_info: Matt works at a museum designing Web sites. Tashia is a full time mother of three children.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: It grounds me and keeps my life in perspective. It's good to be reminded that others in this world have not been as blessed as I have been.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Primarily I am a mom and a Girl Scout leader. I do some schooling at home. I am also a substitute teacher.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: In loving memory of my grandma!

lender.name: Mark & Nelly
lender.loan_because: Helping people help themselves is the highest form of giving.

lender.name: Jeremiah and Jessica
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us and we want to bless others.

lender.name: RAFT PROJECT GROUP
lender.loan_because: We're alive, it's our turn.

lender.name: Chelsea
lender.loan_because: it's a good way to connect with people from all over the world and learn about them. I want people to have the same opportunities that I have.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.occupational_info: I sleep away from home every night in a small room with another person called a dorm. I wake up and walk across my school into a building with rooms for classes. I attend classes anywhere from 2-7 times daily. I do the assignments from the class when I'm not in class. I generally hang out with people in the afternoon. Go to bed at a late hour and then wake up and repeat the process.

lender.name: San Dieguito Academy
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the world, and we think this is one of the best options available to do so.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of high school students committed to making the world a better place. We want to make a difference in the world, one loan at a time.

lender.name: thomas
lender.loan_because: people need a chance.
lender.occupational_info: government regulation of utility companies.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving an opportunity to someone else as I was given to start and grow my business.
lender.occupational_info: I use technology to make the roads safer from driving while intoxicated and speeding in automobiles.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: this is a fantastic way to do something extremely important- help others!
lender.occupational_info: I am entering college at the University of Pennsylvania, where I will major in Chemical Engineering, and in Economics, and where I will minor in Mathematics and in French Studies. As if all that fun could be called, "work..."

lender.name: Alejandra
lender.loan_because: Es lindo contribuir a una buena causa , y mas si es desinteresadamente y a una persona al otro lado del mundo que ocupa nuestra ayuda .

lender.name: Ty and Family
lender.loan_because: This is such a wonderfully wise way to actually help others.
lender.occupational_info: I fly airplanes.

lender.name: Chip
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people who are trying to help themselves and the communities they live in.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to Japanese university students.

lender.name: Dana
lender.occupational_info: I work in a small shop. In September I will return to university to become a school teacher.

lender.name: Geri
lender.loan_because: For Christmas 2007, my wonderful 17-year-old step-son gave me the book "Banker to the Poor" by 2006 Nobel Peace Prize Winner, Muhammad Yunus, founder of the Grameen Bank. I was fascinated and inspired by the book and the concept of micro-credit lending - the idea of helping primarily very poor women, their families and communities by funding their entreprenuarial endeavors seems to make so much sense.
lender.occupational_info: The work I get paid for involves wireless technology. The work that calls to my heart surrounds supporting and empowering women.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I want people to be successful, and everyone should have access to good tools.
lender.occupational_info: I help build virtual worlds.

lender.name: Geiv
lender.loan_because: I believe that people everywhere should have the opportunity to meet their goals through hard work..
lender.occupational_info: An MBA Student

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I want hardworking people to succeed, especially in Afghanistan and Iraq. Politics aside, everyone there deserves a chance to overcome hardship. I hope to help them do that.
lender.occupational_info: I fix airplanes that move people and cargo around the world.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I feel that I should strive everyday to make at least one person's life a little easier. Hopefully by making a loan I can help someone have an easier day.
lender.occupational_info: I do several different jobs around a news station. Operating a camera and running teleprompter, cueing video, and operating the graphics system are some of my responsibilities.

lender.name: Oualid
lender.loan_because: I believe that regardless of financial status everyone has the moral obligation to reach out and touch one life at a time.

lender.name: Harpreet & Natasha
lender.loan_because: I like to empower people
lender.occupational_info: Help people develop software products

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I firmly believe that if you give people a hand they will succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a game artist for video games on the Nintendo DS. As such I am responsible for all the artwork that appears onscreen, I also run a small travel blog with my girlfriend.

lender.name: Henrik
lender.loan_because: I care and this is at good way to make a difference

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I want to help small entrepeneurs with a good business idea to succeed.

lender.name: Joost
lender.loan_because: i want to help people get a better life
lender.occupational_info: i am in contacht with all cultures,

lender.name: MONA
lender.loan_because: parce qu'ils en ont plus besoin que nous, et certainement aussi pour me donner bonne conscience...

lender.name: Jared
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is proving a modern, evolved, method for allowing local cultures to help themselves, maintain dignity, develop skills.

lender.name: Helena Detlof
lender.loan_because: I like seeing development at work

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to help people
lender.occupational_info: I patrol the waterways and help people in distress.

lender.name: St. John the Baptist R.C. Church
lender.loan_because: Jesus says: "Love one another as I have loved you. This is how all will know that you are my disciples, if you have love for one another." John 13:34-35
lender.occupational_info: Our mission is to share Christ's message of justice through love and service with our parish family and beyond.

lender.name: luca
lender.whereabouts: Serravalle Repubblica San Marino Rep. San Marino
lender.loan_because: For help people
lender.occupational_info: Funny

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: Hope to help make a difference in others' lives.
lender.occupational_info: I own a weekly community newspaper and daily Web site in the greater Yellowstone ecosystem, USA. I am a Care2 Network charter member.

lender.name: Mr Multiple
lender.loan_because: I love to stimulate - the sustainable economic development.
lender.occupational_info: Lots of ups and downs, ins and outs.

lender.name: Cliff
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with so much in life and I feel it is my social responsibility to help others who want to help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: I am the head of security for a high tech firm.

lender.name: Guido
lender.loan_because: I never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed people can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has.

lender.name: Carroll
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner and I know how hard it can be to start and keep your business going.

lender.name: Ewen
lender.loan_because: I hope that loaning will be more empowering than simply giving.
lender.occupational_info: I am a primary school teacher working in an International School in Bangkok.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I would like to contribute to a shine of happiness in someone's eyes
lender.occupational_info: I teach at the university and try every moment to make things easy and stimulating for my students. At the pharmacy clients are our focus and we try to do everything to make them feel better.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I love to see people grow.
lender.occupational_info: I transfer information between companies electonically.

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: I believe that the Kingdom of Heaven is a kingdom of equality, and I want to do my part in bringing hope.
lender.occupational_info: I'm attending Hope College in Holland, Michigan to study creative writing and religion.

lender.name: SVE High School
lender.loan_because: The photo is the senior class at Spencer Van Etten High School where I teach and they are the lenders.
lender.occupational_info: 12th grade Social Studies. Government, Economics, History, politics, life in general

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: I want to give people the opportunity to achieve their goals in life. I feel as though I am very blessed and it is important to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Currently I am in college. I am studying to be a Registered Nurse. When I graduate I plan on working in a hospital.

lender.name: Meg
lender.loan_because: I have.
lender.occupational_info: I used to teach high school mathematics (Geometry & Algebra 2). I now volunteer with two organizations. The first cooks for people with AIDS who are unable fend for themselves. The second helps victims of Domestic Violence get help either legally or emotionally.

lender.name: Scott and Vera
lender.loan_because: its the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I design computer applications that assist customers in automating their business.

lender.name: Dori
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to live their dream and better their life and the lives of their family. Knowing I can help people around the world and teach my children to do the same is priceless.

lender.name: Yakut
lender.loan_because: I know what it is to be in need. Right now I have the means to help those who can use a little bit of a support, so I am.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with using technology in their teaching and learning. I teach them how to use computers to accomplish what they need to do.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I believe microloans can change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies use computers to improve their business.

lender.name: Tuomas
lender.loan_because: I participate in Kiva because I believe in the transformative power of even small amounts of capital applied to the right project.
lender.occupational_info: I am a co-founder at a web startup.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: There are many people worse off than you or I.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an insurance company

lender.name: Shelley
lender.loan_because: We are here to help our brothers and sisters. Kiva is a great organization because it is not about giving handouts. It is about helping others support their families through hard work and perserverence.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a doctor as a team to provide healthcare and health education to patients.

lender.name: Innovative
lender.loan_because: This loan program is new and it makes more sense to me. Other humanitarian attempts have not come close to eliminating poverty and some have been tried for centuries. When something does not work try something new like KIVA.
lender.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur and know how difficult it is to start a business without money.or the access to loans

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I believe people should have the chance to be successful in their pursuits. Kiva gives people all over the world that opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: As an HR Generalist, I recruit new employees to our company, administer health benefits, and provide employee relations assistance when necessary. Its a job that provides a lot of variety and interaction.

lender.name: 2 PS HOLDINGS, INC.
lender.loan_because: I want others to have an opportunity to suceed.
lender.occupational_info: I own a trading company to Europe, Japan, and Korea.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: everyone could use a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an administrative assistant for a Canadian Government department. I also am an independent distributor for Xocai, a healthy chocolate.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: it makes people's dreams come true.

lender.name: Oona
lender.loan_because: Give someone a fish vs. give them the ability to buy their own fish market. For example.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: my son gave me a gift certificate.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: This is a great way of helping people to become self-sufficient
lender.occupational_info: I am a Legal Aid Attorney. I provide legal services to those who normally couldn't afford it.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: no one can succeed without help from friends
lender.occupational_info: I handle the consumer protection regulations that affect the bicycle products my company distributes.
